channel.title: [PI] Server Messages
channel.description:
Im using a 317 Solitude source [ Insidia ] I want to make it so that whenever somebody get's a 99 in a skill , it sends a server message so everybody can see .. like - "Congratulations to T0xicsnip3r who has achieved 99 in Strength"
Also i would like to make a server message for when anybody gets a good boss drop ( sorta like lootshare ) but i cant ppl who arent in clan chat to see as well.. for items like spirit shield sigils .. godsword hilts .. dragonfire shield .. dragon claws .. staff of light .. Etc..
If anybody could help me that would be great.

item.title: [PI] Server Messages
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

confusing…can u teamviewer or skype me?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server Messages
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Go to playerAssistant, and find the addSkillExp method (i think it’s named that) and add a check before the last brace:

if(newLevel == 99) {//not sure about the variable present.
//then add your code here where you will loop through the players array and send a message to each slot that is not nulled.
}

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server Messages
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

yeah i know but whats the code to see when somebody achieves a 99?
and where do i place it

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server Messages
item.dc:creator: @Doggie_Skill Doggie Skill
item.description:
@Doggie_Skill wrote:

For the skills one, it has to be something like:

playerHandler.sendMessageToAll (“NubbyNub has achieved 99 Herblore!”);

I’m not exactly sure, but thats part of it.

Read full topic
